author: dion
msg: 'Fixed' the Parser so that it no longer just kept a note of the previous revision number,
but instead, treated the previous revision(s) as if they were as important as the
current revision, giving a truer picture of the changes that have occurred

author: dion
msg: - Added links in changelog to cvs web url
- moved odd/even row printing to a macro

author: dion
msg: Fixed bug where multiple file commits were not being picked up

author: dion
msg: - made the message format as it is from CVS
